subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Rangers acquired Keith Yandle, who topped the Coyotes this season with 41 points in 63 games and leads all defensemen in power-play points since the start of the 2009-10 season.
snippet: The Rangers acquired Keith Yandle, who topped the Coyotes this season with 41 points in 63 games and leads all defensemen in power-play points since the start of the 2009-10 season.
